posts.content:
Hi,

Yes that sounds exactly the same type of table with the fold down single leg at the back and the ladder type folding front as seen on the pic.

A pic would be great - thank you!

caroline craggs wrote:Hi,

Yes that sounds exactly the same type of table with the fold down single leg at the back and the ladder type folding front as seen on the pic.

A pic would be great - thank you!


Hi Caroline,
Here are the pics you need - should be able to make one from these http://s429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20 ... 20bracket/ Bracket itself is pretty simple. Let us know if you need anything else.

Your bus is awesome BTW! Love factory safaris

Cheers,
Chris & Gina

Just came across this thread, are you still all there...? I have a May 62 Dormobile, fully restored (with a some cheeky mods!). As I understand, they only started making this conversion in late 61. I've only ever seen 63> Dorms. Can send pics if anyone needs more ref or interested (how do you upload pics to this forum!!??)

Regards

Dean

Hi Sorry this is such a late reply! I haven't been on the forum in ages. I'd love to see some pics of your Dormobile if you're still offering
